name: Homestyle Tuna Pot Pie
author: Anna Bollinger

ingredients.name: pkg. refrigerated all-ready pie crusts (2 crusts)
(12 1⁄2 oz.) can chunk light tuna, drained
(10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas and carrots
(10 3/4 oz.) can cream of potato or mushroom soup
tsp. poultry seasoning or dried thyme

instructions: Line 9 inch pie pan with 1 crust; set aside. Combine remaining ingredients. Add salt and pepper to taste. Pour filling in pie pan. Top with second crust. Seal and crimp edges. Slit top of crust to vent and bake at 375° for 45 to 50 minutes or until golden brown.
